typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> ReadTripsDataTable
ReadTripsDataTable derive(GrpBy = 1,
		Elements = @(medallion=medallion,
		hack_license=hack_license,
		vendor_id=vendor_id,
		rate_code=rate_code,
		store_and_fwd_flag=store_and_fwd_flag,
		passenger_count=passenger_count,
		trip_time_in_secs=trip_time_in_secs,
		trip_distance=trip_distance,
		pickup=@(pickup_datetime=pickup_datetime,
		pickup_longitude=pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude=pickup_latitude),
		dropoff=@(dropoff_datetime=dropoff_datetime,
		dropoff_longitude=dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude=dropoff_latitude))) ~> CreateJsonStructure
CreateJsonStructure aggregate(groupBy(GrpBy),
	Elements = collect(Elements)) ~> CreateArray
CreateArray sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['tripfares-data-export.json'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Root = Elements
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteJsonFile
